name: NFTEarth
description: NFTEarth aims to be the Omnichain NFT hub and one stop shop for all things NFT related. The protocol has both a native token built on the LayerZero Omnichain OFT standard (with the name NFTEarthOFT and symbol NFTE across all chains) as well as a multichain marketplace for users to trade, create, and collect NFTs. The protocol is currently live across multiple chains including Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon, Avalanche, BNB Chain, Mantle, Linea, Base, and Ethereum with more chains to come.
